item.description: Whiskey "Live The World's premiere whiskey tasting show" and the Boston Millionaires Meet Up in New York City. Yes Wednesday April 6th 2011 we are attending a festive whiskey and fine spirits party at the fabulous Pier 60 Chelsea Sports Complex 23 rd st. on the Hudson River. Whiskey Live returns to the spectacular Pier creating a magnificent evening of great whiskey, fine food and wonderful entertainment in the heart of NYC. Look for Whiskey Live on the Internet for more Information. Please let us know at Boston Millionaires if you want to attend the event as this will be an overnight trip to NYC.
item.name: 4-06-11 Whiskey Live "The World's premier whiskey tasting show" in NYC.
